Class Employee

  • java.lang.Object
    • Person
      • Employee

  • public class Employee
extends Person
    Employee class - contains all information for Employee object Extends Person class and so inherits fields name, gender, nin, dob, address and postcode Also includes id, salary, startDate, title, email and an image Also includes getters and setters for each field, a toString function and validation for inserting employee data
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lucy MacGlashan 15107763
